_description: Six lines on Wade, inserted in a Latin sermon on humility — two roughly-rhyming triplets

CamPeter255.First Lines:
Summe sende ylues& summe sende nadderessumme sende
                    nikeres…
CamPeter255.Attributed Title: Ita quod dicere possunt cum Wade (f. 49ra)
CamPeter255.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Peterhouse
                College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1899: 137.
Wilson,  Richard Middlewood. 
             The Lost Literature of Medieval England.
         London: Methuen, 1952: 17.
